page.title: 19AMENITIES & SERVICES
page.content: Westonzoyland is very well off for amenities and services. We have: {2 General Stores DELIVERIES { a Newsagent Milkman { a Postoffice Bread & Cakes { a Butchers Gas,Coal,Oil. { a School Fish & Chips { a Garage Groceries { Church Fish { Church Hall Post { Community Centre { Somerset Youth Association HQ. { 2 Public Houses Public Telephone { Taxi Service Window Cleaner { Mobile Library Park { Dog Kennels {Bus Service {Doctor's Surgery {Driving School {Plumber,Builder,Electrician {Decorator.
